title: Stan Getz - 1982 - Pure Getz (2003 SACD 24 88.2) FLAC
description:
Stan Getz - 1982 - Pure Getz (2003)
SACD 24 bits, 88.2 KHz rip

Stan Getz's 1982 band featured the harmonically advanced pianist Jim McNeely, bassist Marc Johnson and drummer Victor Lewis; Billy Hart fills in for Lewis on three numbers. This date sticks (with one exception) to high-quality jazz standards, some of which ("Sippin at Bell's") are not performed all that often. Getz is particularly swinging on "Tempus Fugit" and quite lyrical on Billy Strayhorn's "Blood Count." (AllMusic)


Track list:
01. On the Up and Up
02. Blood Count
03. Very Early
04. Sipping at Bell's
05. I Wish I Knew
06. Come Rain or Come Shine
07. Tempus Fugit

Personnel:
Stan Getz tenor saxophone
James McNeely piano
Marc Johnson bass
Victor Lewis drums
